greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Kolakoski-(4,2) sequence: a(n) is length of n-th run.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: seed = {4, 2}; w = {}; i = 1; Do[w = Join[w, Array[seed[[Mod[i - 1, Length[seed]] + 1]] &, If[i > Length[w], seed, w][[i]]]]; i++, {n, 35}]; w (* _Ivan Neretin_, Apr 02 2015 *)
results.author: Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Sep 08 2002
